author: Khaleda Rahman
title: Dog Runs Away From Home to Find Hospital Where Owner Later Died of Coronavirus
description: The 7-year-old German shepherd's owner died after being hospitalized in intensive care with the virus in Pisa, Italy.
content:
After her owner was hospitalized with coronavirus in Italy, a dog called Stella went searching for him. The 7-year-old German shepherd's owner had been taken into intensive care after becoming ill with the virus, Italian newspaper Il Messagero reported.
Days… [+5046 chars]
